frontMatter.title: Spring Boot With Kafka Communication
frontMatter.author: Amrut Prabhu
frontMatter.summary: In this, we will be looking into how we can publish and subscribe to a Kafka topic using Spring Kafka

prev.title: Circuit Breaker And Retry with Spring Cloud Resiliance4j
prev.author: Amrut Prabhu
prev.summary: In this article, we will be looking into how we can integrate a circuit breaker and a retry mechanism, to handle failures while making synchronous calls to another service.

next.title: Spring Cloud Stream With Kafka
next.author: Amrut Prabhu
next.summary: Here, we will be looking into how we can communicate with a Kafka Cluster using Spring Cloud Stream
